Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class BankDefinition

Represents a bank known to be supported by Online EFTPOS, and the associated payer id types that is supports.

Inheritance

BankDefinition(String, IList<String>)

Partial constructor.

Declaration
public BankDefinition(string id, IList<string> payerIdTypes)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String id

The unique id of this bank, case insensitive. Also used for DisplayName.
System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.String> payerIdTypes

A list of strings containing allowed payer id types for this bank.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentException

Thrown if Id is an empty string or whitespace.
System.ArgumentNullException

Thrown if Id or PayerIdTypes is null.

Declaration
public BankDefinition(string id, string displayName, IList<string> payerIdTypes)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String id

The unique id of this bank, case insensitive.
System.String displayName

The display name of this bank. If null then id will be used.
System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.String> payerIdTypes

A list of strings containing allowed payer id types for this bank.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentException

Thrown if Id is an empty string or whitespace.
System.ArgumentNullException

Thrown if Id or PayerIdTypes is null.

Id

Returns the unique, case insensitive, id of this bank.

Declaration
public string Id { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
Remarks

This must be the actual id passed to the Online EFTPOS API via BankId when making transaction requests.
